summary: 在熄灯区部署GM4气球动物展台并点亮入口的建造计划
commands: execute in world positioned 1.87 64.00 -0.03 rotated 173.55 0 run function gm4_balloon_animals:build/setup_showcase
execute in world positioned 1.87 64.00 -0.03 rotated 173.55 0 run function gm4_balloon_animals:build/populate_showcase

steps.title: 阶段 1

steps.title: 阶段 2
steps.description: 执行：围绕目标拆解两步执行：准备资源并落地社区验证。
